evidence.claim: Henry Schein MicroMD utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The platform supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.
MicroMD is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
Integration capabilities include support for EDI X12 transaction sets.
MicroMD leverages Azure for scalable healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in EDI-based transactions and supports X12 standards, relevant for API automation.
